me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.util

Class SoilSaturation

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.util.SoilSaturation

  • public class SoilSaturation
extends Object
    Manage the "saturation" level of a block for the purposes of STB farming tools.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_SATURATION
      The maximum saturation level for a soil block before it turns to water.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SoilSaturation()
